title: When you're super-fed, a team fight starts, your teammates all die almost instantly...
body:
And the enemy team decides to try and take you 5 on 1:

http://imgur.com/tOJQ20i

replies.body: How I feel when I'm {{champion:420}}
Really? Not{{champion:59}}?
let the dunking begin {{champion:122}}.
https://youtu.be/C3SQnczWAHU
"Please someone gank me, I want a double kill"
Name one champion that won't get screwed over if he tries to take 5 people at once? Illaoi might kill maybe 3 but not 5. Come on.

I would disagree. I once fought a kinda fed Illaoi and she nearly 1v5'd us, even with all of our CC. She only a 2-3 full items, and while she was about 16, we where maybe 11/12. If my memory serves, the illaoi was also about 5/2. We almost killed her, then the ult went off, and half our health was lost. We still won that battle without any casualties, but it was brutal. The moral of this story is, a hyper fed Illaoi (9/1, maybe five items) could probably 1v5 a team underfed champions.

> [{quoted}](name=JVP15,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9j1dOXxh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-03-13T15:18:47.168+0000)
>
> I would disagree. I once fought a kinda fed Illaoi and she nearly 1v5'd us, even with all of our CC. She only a 2-3 full items, and while she was about 16, we where maybe 11/12. If my memory serves, the illaoi was also about 5/2. We almost killed her, then the ult went off, and half our health was lost. We still won that battle without any casualties, but it was brutal. The moral of this story is, a hyper fed Illaoi (9/1, maybe five items) could probably 1v5 a team underfed champions.

legit all you have to do is walk away from her ult... she has no cc besides spirit vessel
{{champion:90}} Yeah, let me just use my escapes.

> [{quoted}](name=Akesgeroth,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9j1dOXxh,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-13T20:42:44.247+0000)
>
> {{champion:90}} Yeah, let me just use my escapes.

You legit don't need escapes, her tentacles are stationary... you just walk away and she does no dmg lol
Walk.... Away? What is this, the lcs? You run right into that meat grinder and scream THANK YOU SIR MAY I HAVE ANOTHER like all true league players.

{{item:3116}} is also an option against champions like that. Slow her down to make walking away easier.

Granted, you might sacrifice an item for later if you rush it early... but when buying a more defensive item, you sacrifice some offensive power. You can't have both.

If you build her with a respectable amount of AD, and manage to catch 4+ people (including revenant), you will easily deal 50% or more to any squishy champ instantly. Doesn't matter what happens after that, you did your part. And if you have death dance , sterrak's, and maw, you will survive and heal whatever is thrown at you. Easy penta for fed illaoi.

>and while she was about 16, we where maybe 11/12. 

Three levels is three more levels into spells, which give higher bases, better cooldowns, and occasionally better scaling. Not to mention base stats.

Not a good fight to pick. Honestly should have peeled and gotten away :<
Just walk away from her tentacles. Name one champion that won't get screwed over. Even Darius gets killed eventually if he gets cc-d.

It depends on positioning, a LOT of champs with gold lead against some teamcomps/bad positions/cds can 1v5 and come out alive and victorious.

Assassins with resets/AoE can often mop up a split and low group or even healthy groups when sufficiently fed.

Bruisers, if the enemy adc isn't to scary/lacks peel many fed bruisers can ambush in choke points and take out the enemy team.

Casters, long range/AoE casters that are far enough ahead can burst down the squishies if they positioned poorly before kiting and killing the tankier enemies

ADCs, a fed AoE like twitch/mf could ambush and delete an entire team if they don't have the positioning/cc to prevent their damage and mobile adcs against split up teams can often clean up 5 1v1s/1v2s

Supports, I did this once as {{champion:161}} but depending on champs you're probably not equipped to 1v5 even with bad positioning by enemies

Tank, some tanks can make like a bruiser and murder groups when ahead.

Champs that can do it easier, {{champion:55}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:32}} and many more on channel 4
Really? Then explain all the 1 v 5 pentakill montages all over the internet.
you forgot veigar if they're stupid

In lower ELO anything fed with enough statballiness or mobility, paired with just a smidge of luck, can 1v5. So, {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:1}} ? Probably not. {{champion:86}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:77}} ? much more likely.
Low elo doesn't count either. Game isn't balanced around unskilled players. Sorry.
Why that? We are more, and we can't play well like it's currently balanced around, but good players could play badly to fit if the balance was focused around us.

You are more but you are not an objective perspective to balance the game around. The only reason why Riot should pay attention to you is to make the game more fun rather than balanced. Doing both takes time.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9j1dOXxh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-13T15:03:13.700+0000)
>
> Name one champion that won't get screwed over if he tries to take 5 people at once? Illaoi might kill maybe 3 but not 5. Come on.
I call BS. Have you seem her drop ult in the middle of 5people before

depends on the power levels of the team. Tanky bruiser when far ahead can 1 v 5. Same with some assassins. It almost never happens though or happens because the enemy team makes a mistake or are super low.
You must not watch Imaqtpie...
What movie is this from?

It is. The character is called Walter Kovacs aka "Rorschach." Decently adapted comic book film.

> [{quoted}](name=PePsiLemoNN,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9j1dOXxh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-13T10:36:11.382+0000)
>
> What movie is this from?

Boku no Pico live action version.

This reminds me of a Twitch I fought some time ago. We had just won a teamfight and where doing dragon. All five of us. The Twitch wasn't even very fed, but as we where doing dragon, he unlstealthed, and unleashed his ultimate. Because is is a penetrating AA, he did a massive amount of damage to all of us, and we died. He got a Pentakill.

I guess you could say you... _sunglasses_ didn't see that coming.
**YEEEAAAHHH!!!** 
(I wanted to come up with a better pun to invoke that particular meme, but after sitting here for 5 minutes I've still got nothing. Feel free to improve upon my lowly offering!)

I can one up you. I was playing an ARAM and we wiped 4/5 of the enemy team. I was janna and my ult was up, so I told my team to group around me so i could ult and heal them. Twitch pops out, and I realize my decision to ult my team gave him that penta. We were all laughing continuously for the rest of the game.

how i feel when i play {{champion:58}}  and i have {{item:3748}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3065}} at 30 minutes...

Are you SURE you want to fight me?
Playing Full AD renekton is more fun

{{champion:75}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3053}} 
Bring it on, heheh
Full AD {{champion:59}} that ults the entire enemy team together
{{champion:157}}
I was on the other side of this one just yesterday. A tank Akali (how is that even possible) ran over our team a couple of times. Bronze problems, I know, but man, did it suck...

Can you give an example of a champion against a legitimate team comp who could actually 1v5 a fight without the enemies making huge misplays, even if he's ahead say 15/3/1? 

I mean, I see it happen (what I'm saying is it's not because the 5v1 was a bad fight, rather because the 5 misplayed terribly). WAY more often though, I see said fed player get 1 or 2 kills before dying (sometimes 3, very rarely 4). 

Aside from them running at you one at a time, or all being down summoners and ultimates and even a few regular cooldowns... I just don't see it. I guess a reset champion could pull it off, but even then a little hard CC would shut them down pretty quick in a 1v5.
{{champion:74}} when he is ganked and you are fighting in his turrets.
that feeling when u were playing old full crit yi and has PD+IE+SS+BT+attackspped boot+GA in 25 minute
